result.title: SPOJEDIT â€” An editorial platform for spoj.
result.content:
Hi Friends,

I wish Happy and Prosperous new year to all. I hope, next words of mine will be a kind of new year gift to all of us. I present you SPOJEDIT , a website dedicated for the compilation of quality editorials for problems on spoj.

For more information, please visit About the website . Currently I have hosted it on free domain, but in coming time I'll surely move it to a paid one. Kindly let me know your suggestions.
